meanings.sent1: She made an uncalculating decision without thinking about the consequences.
meanings.sent2: The uncalculating squirrel darted across the road without looking both ways.
meanings.sent3: The uncalculating puppy ran headfirst into the wall, mistaking it for an open door.
meanings.sent4: His uncalculating behavior led him into a series of unfortunate events.
meanings.sent5: The uncalculating child jumped into the pool without checking the water depth.

meanings.sent1: Her uncalculating actions caused more harm than good in the long run.
meanings.sent2: The uncalculating driver changed lanes without signaling, causing a near accident.
meanings.sent3: The uncalculating chef accidentally added salt instead of sugar to the cake batter.
meanings.sent4: His uncalculating approach to investments left him in financial trouble.
meanings.sent5: The uncalculating explorer ventured into the jungle without a map or supplies.
